titleStmt.title: By the Queene a proclamation agaynst the maintenaunce of pirates.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
publicationStmt.pubPlace: Imprinted at London in Powles Churchyarde :

notesStmt.note: Contains woodcut initial with illustration of Neptune and two sea horses.
Last complete line of text ends "example".
"Gyuen at Otelande the thyrde day of August, 1569. in the eleuenth yere of her Maiesties raigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
